title: Design Systems
description: Building scalable, maintainable component libraries with clear documentation

principles.title: Single Source of Truth
principles.description: A centralized repository where all design decisions live, ensuring consistency across all platforms and tools.

principles.title: Separazione tra Semantica e Presentazione
principles.description: Separating meaning from appearance allows components to be flexible, reusable, and maintainable across different contexts.

principles.title: Scalabilità
principles.description: Design systems must grow with the organization, supporting new teams, products, and use cases without breaking existing implementations.

principles.title: Consistenza Comportamentale
principles.description: Components should behave predictably across different contexts, following established interaction patterns and user expectations.

principles.title: Composizione > Configurazione
principles.description: Building complex interfaces through composition of smaller, focused components rather than configuring monolithic ones.

principles.title: API Stability e Versioning Consapevole
principles.description: Maintaining stable APIs while evolving the system, with clear versioning strategies and migration paths.

principles.title: Governance Chiara
principles.description: Establishing clear processes for contributions, reviews, and decision-making to ensure quality and consistency.

principles.title: Documentazione come Interfaccia Primaria
principles.description: Comprehensive, accessible documentation that serves as the primary way teams discover and use design system components.

principles.title: Accessibilità come Requisito Strutturale
principles.description: Accessibility built into the foundation of every component, not added as an afterthought.

principles.title: Misurabilità dell'Impatto
principles.description: Tracking metrics that demonstrate the value and effectiveness of the design system on product quality and team efficiency.
